sentences.sContent: Electricity is the main material for chlorate production.
sentences.sContent_eng: Electricity is the main material for chlorate production.
sentences.sCn: 电是生产氯酸盐的主要原料。

sentences.sContent: Happened to have some sodium chlorate lying around from a hot tub we just picked up.
sentences.sContent_eng: Happened to have some sodium chlorate lying around from a hot tub we just picked up.
sentences.sCn: 碰巧有一些氯酸钠从热躺在浴缸，我们拿起左右。

sentences.sContent: Sodium chlorate is a kind of mineral salt which has wide use in bleaching, dyeing, etc.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sodium chlorate is a kind of mineral salt which has wide use in bleaching, dyeing, etc.
sentences.sCn: 氯酸钠是一种用途广泛的无机盐，是制备二氧化氯的重要原料。

words.tran: [矿物] 绿泥石；[无化] 亚氯酸盐

trans.tranOther: any salt of chloric acid, containing the monovalent ion ClO3
